remarks: Define the set of p-groups, which are groups such that every element has a power of ` p ` as its order.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
df-pgp $p |- pGrp = { <. p , g >. | ( ( p e. Prime /\ g e. Grp ) /\ A. x e. ( Base ` g ) E. n e. NN0 ( ( od ` g ) ` x ) = ( p ^ n ) ) } $.
$d g n p x $.
